abstract: New York Yankees general manager Brian Cashman does not have obvious candidate to replace Derek Jeter as team captain, but does not feel position needs to be filled at all.
lead_paragraph: General Manager Brian Cashman reiterated on Thursday what he said on at least two occasions last season — that he would like to have the title of captain retired along with Derek Jeter.

headline.main: Yankees’ Captaincy Is Open, and It May Stay That Way
headline.print_headline: Yankees’ Captaincy Is Open, and It May Stay That Way

snippet: General Manager Brian Cashman reiterated on Thursday what he said on at least two occasions last season — that he would like to have the title of captain retired along with Derek Jeter.
